LanguageData.MakeRoastwMushrooms.label: cook pot roast and mushrooms
LanguageData.MakeRoastwMushrooms.description: Prepare a roast with seared mushrooms on top. Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakeRoastwMushrooms_Bulk.label: cook pot roast and mushrooms (x4)
LanguageData.MakeRoastwMushrooms_Bulk.description: Prepare a couple of pots and throw in a roast and a couple of mushrooms in each one and wait ... Bam! Pot roast and mushrooms. Produces 4.
LanguageData.MakeStewMushrooms.label: cook mushroom stew
LanguageData.MakeStewMushrooms.description: Prepares a hearty stew of mushrooms. Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakeStewMushrooms_Bulk.label: cook mushroom stew (x4)
LanguageData.MakeStewMushrooms_Bulk.description: Prepares hearty stews of mushrooms. Produces 4.
LanguageData.MakeSaladwMushrooms.label: cook mushroom salad
LanguageData.MakeSaladwMushrooms.description: Prepares a salad of mushrooms. Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakeSaladwMushrooms_Bulk.label: cook mushroom salads (x4)
LanguageData.MakeSaladwMushrooms_Bulk.description: Prepares several salads of mushrooms. Produces 4.
